### Rationale

Extending hipsycl package to version 0.9.1

### Description

hipsycl@0.9.1 partially implements SYCL 2020 standard which provides support for Unified Shared Memory. Currently there is only version 0.8 available in Spack.


### Additional information

Here is a corresponding PR #22770. The proposed changes have been tested on my local PC (x86, ubuntu 18.04)

title: hipsycl with SYCL 2020 partial support
